alert.note: Alert for Kittson; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 10 at 5:04PM CST until December 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than 1/2 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, West Polk, Kittson and West Marshall Counties. In North Dakota, Cavalier, Pembina, Eastern Walsh, Grand Forks, Traill and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy dense fog has formed across portions of the central and northern Red River Valley. This is expected to expand westward during the evening and overnight. Visibility as low as 1/4 mile is possible.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
